mapper.insert: INSERT INTO message (senderId, receiverId, content, sendDate) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM message where receiverId = #{receiverId} AND isReceiverDeleted = false order by `sendDate` desc limit #{skip}, #{size};
SELECT count(*) FROM message where receiverId = #{receiverId} AND isReceiverDeleted = false;
SELECT * FROM message where senderId = #{senderId} AND isSenderDeleted = false order by `sendDate` desc limit #{skip}, #{size};
SELECT count(*) FROM message where senderId = #{senderId} AND isSenderDeleted = false;
mapper.update: UPDATE message SET isRead = true, readDate = now() WHERE `index` = #{index};
UPDATE message SET isReceiverDeleted = true WHERE `index` = #{index}
UPDATE message SET isSenderDeleted = true WHERE `index` = #{index}
